titles: A loue-sick maids song lately beguild, by a run-away louer that left her with childe. To the tune of, In Melton on a day.
notes: Printer's name and date of publication from STC.
Identified as part of STC 25283 at reel 2052:12c.
reproduction of the original in the Pepysian Library, Magdalene College, Cambridge, England.
Identified by ESTC as STC (2nd ed.) 17186.5.
keywords: Pregnancy in literature --  Early works to 1800.
